name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VI Arcane: The Battle Horizon Awaits Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the epic battle of VI Arcane to your browser with dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek, minimalist design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: VI from Arcane in an intense battle-ready pose.
Minimalist Design: Clean, streamlined interface for smooth browsing.
Clock and Date: Stay on top of time with the clock and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Easy access to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Convenient and fast search functionality.
